name: Attack Of The Space Mongooses
description:
JAM GAME!!! ... Made for Game Breaker's Toolkit Jam!

Can you save all realities from the attack of the Space Mongooses?! ... I doubt it, but you can try! Good Luck Captain!

Use your keyboard to control the game ...

( X, Q, A, Z, C )

... You know what to do!!

( The game is intentionally terrible, BUT BEATABLE ... Rules of the JAM ... so if you have any suggestions to make it better ... I'll just ignore them all :) Thanks!
